title: Prawn, Spring Onion and Egg Ribbon Soup
ingredients: ['1 litre fish or chicken stock, made with stock cubes', '1 lemongrass stalk, crushed', '2cm piece of fresh root ginger, peeled and thinly sliced', '1 bunch of spring onions, sliced', '100g Thai fragrant rice, or long-grain or basmati rice', '2 tbsp rice vinegar or white wine vinegar', '175g cooked, peeled prawns', '200g bean sprouts', '3 eggs, lightly beaten', '4 tsp chilli oil']
